title: Video: Tears & Marble – What Is Love (Haddaway Cover)
body:
I was sent this a couple of weeks back, but due to Christmas / New Years / temporarily hating ‘blogging’, it’s taken me rather longer than expected to write it up.

Dutch duo **Tears & Marbles** are set to release their debut EP in the coming months, and for the time being have unveiled this rather fantastic take on **Haddaway’s** classic _What Is Love_. At points sounding like Lana Del Rey fronting a synth-pop outfit, it’s far from the dancefloor filler that shot the original version to fame.
